name: echocial
description: Backend of Echocial. A mobile-first app for online reputation
author: Ahmed Derbala <derbala.ahmed531992@gmail.com>

scripts.first-time:local: cp src/config/index.js src/config/local.config.js && npm run i && npm run start:local
scripts.first-time:prod: cp src/config/index.js src/config/production.config.js && npm run i && npm run start:prod-pm2-monit
scripts.start:prod-pm2: npm run i:prod && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start --name echocial src/main.js -i max --node-args='--max-old-space-size=32000' -f
scripts.start:local-pm2: pm2 start src/config/pm2.config.js --env local && pm2 monit
scripts.push: npm run format && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.pull: git pull origin main && npm run i && npm run start:local
scripts.clean: npm run clean:only && npm run i && npm run start:local
scripts.clean:prod: rm -r -f node_modules && npm cache clean -f && npm run i:prod
scripts.clean:only: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -r -f node_modules && npm cache clean -f
scripts.backup: rm -r -f backups/* && mkdir backups -p && cp package.json backups/package.json.backup && cp package-lock.json backups/package-lock.json.backup 2>/dev/null; true && mv node_modules backups/node_modules.backup 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.update: npm run backup && npm run ncu && npm run clean
scripts.restore: cp backups/package.json.backup package.json && cp backups/package-lock.json.backup package-lock.json && mv backups/node_modules.backup node_modules && npm run start:local
